author: oloveridgegreene
title: Katie Price confesses to passionate night in Simon Cowell’s bed admitting it was her ‘first time with a proper man’
text:
TV Magazine 'I LOVED HIS HAIRY CHEST' Katie Price confesses to passionate night in Simon Cowell’s bed admitting it was her ‘first time with a proper man’ 
The Loose women panellist said the X Factor supremo invited her back to his London mansion after an awards bash Exclusive
